title: Door
description: Describes if any door is open (or to be more precise â€“ if the door lock is released). Also see topic pe/doors_individually for status on individual doors.

traceId.description: A unique identifier to be able to trace this message. Also used to detect duplicate messages received.

doorOpen.description: True if any door is open (door lock is released). False if door lock is activated.

atDateTime.description: ISO 8601. Reflects the UTC time when the state changed.
